title: Darjeeling
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Take-out, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Large Indian restaurant near the Arc de Triumph, in the 17th arrondissement. Has a vegetarian section on the menu, all of which is parve (no dairy or meat-products) Kosher-certified by orthodoxe kehillat, and all parve options are vegan. Instead of dairy cheese, tofu and soy cheese is used. Instead of ghee, oil is used. Most breads (even those stuffed with "cheese") are parve and vegan. Colorful atmosphere. Dec 2015 reported still operating.
